explains: adj. 和睦的，融洽的；悦耳的；和谐的，协调的
wordGroup: harmonious socialist society 社会主义和谐社会

sentences.en: His harmonious unity with nature is broken.
sentences.cn: 他与自然的和谐被破坏。

sentences.en: There are several ways to create and maintain a harmonious dormitory life.
sentences.cn: 有很多方法可以创造并维持一个和谐的宿舍生活。

sentences.en: Third, it is a healthy lifestyle and will help mould a harmonious social atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 第三，它是一种健康的生活方式，将有助于塑造一种和谐的社会氛围。
